title: CRAZY HORSE APPEARING
description: Get the first professionally printed edition of an ALL NEW biography of Chief Crazy Horse, revealing freshly found facts about his life, and the ONLY fully authenticated (by Lakota people) photo of Crazy Horse known to exist. $25.95 in glossy paperback from ISHI Press, or $3.99 as an e-book.Crazy Horse Appearing is a well researched, highly acclaimed work of creative nonfiction. The book's Introduction (which is true) is not recommended for people who are easily frightened by ghosts.
author: Judee Shipman
